messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I’m not quite sure yet—could you share (for example) your latitude and longitude, or another reference point I can look up for you?
I don't have any more info. Can you figure it out yourself?

I’m afraid I can’t determine your location unless you provide some kind of clue—such as latitude/longitude coordinates, a nearby landmark, an address fragment, or something similar. Could you share any detail at all that might help me look it up?
I really don’t have any other info. Is there a way for you to access my location services to find out?

I’m sorry, but I don’t have any way to access your device’s location services or identify where you are on my own. If you can share even a rough hint—like the name of a nearby city, landmark, or latitude/longitude coordinates—I can look it up for you.
